1.title: I'm Going to Get Married Here!
1.plot: 14 singles longing for love & marriage move into the Spouse House, a place where proposals & weddings can happen weekly! Guided by relationship experts, everyone quickly forms romantic connections, including love triangles. Who will get engaged first?

2.title: The Grass Is Always Greener
2.plot: Did Missy's bold interruption during the Engagement Ceremony work in her favor or is her time in the House over? Two love triangles are in full force, but as passions run high hearts may be broken. All bets are off when the floor is opened for proposals.

3.title: Living as Husband and Wife
3.plot: The singles say goodbye to friends who haven't made romantic connections, and a second love triangle ends in tears. To help strengthen the existing couples' bonds, the experts pair them into Exploratory Marriages. Will this lead to another proposal?

4.title: Are You Ready for This?
4.plot: Although Danny proposed, hard realities must be considered: his parents don't agree with The Spouse House's accelerated marriage process, and Yesnaya will only marry if her son approves of his future stepfather. The others discuss their own futures.

5.title: Make or Break
5.plot: After the first wedding, everyone takes stock of their commitments: are they ready to get engaged, or should some couples take a break? Jimmy meets Kelli Jo's father with a specific agenda, and Chris & Missy's future is suddenly uncertain.

6.title: Ride or Die
6.plot: Does Missy's bold decision mean she's leaving the Spouse House single and alone? While Tom & Ashley Lauren continue to have their ups and downs, Scott may have just met his future wife. A sudden twist to Jimmy and Kelli Jo's love story shocks everyone.

7.title: That Could Have Been Me
7.plot: Will issues from Kelli Jo's and Jimmy's pasts stop them from saying "I Do" at the altar? Tom thinks he may have made a mistake in choosing Ashley Lauren over Kelli Jo, and prepares to make a shocking move on the wedding day.

8.title: Shaking Things Up
8.plot: Since the clock is ticking, the Experts reveal multiple bombshells that impact all the remaining singles. Tracy and Scott are a bundle of nerves when they visit her brother; will her family approve of the couple getting married?

9.title: Last Chances
9.plot: It's time for the FINAL Engagement Ceremony, and all four remaining unmarried couples are overwhelmed by a roller coaster of emotions. Since every couple can get engaged, there could be four weddings to plan! Or, will some hearts be forever broken?

10.title: Tell All
10.plot: All 27 men and women who entered the Spouse House are reunited for the first time. Everyone discusses the state of their relationships, old love triangles, and there are shocking revelations. Emotions run high, tensions flare, but love is also in the air.

imdb.plot outline: In a daring new love experiment, six single men and six single women move into a house with the intent of finding their spouse and their happily ever after. Each week, the newly coupled groups either accept a proposal or face an eviction from the house.
imdb.title: The Spouse House
plot: In a daring new love experiment, six single men and six single women move into a house with the intent of finding their spouse and their happily ever after. Each week, the newly coupled groups either accept a proposal or face an eviction from the house.
